data.actual_result: There's space more than what is required for the text; probably for the rp icon which is a feature request as per Jethro. So, no point in having the space until the icon doesn't come.
data.expected_result: There's space only to accommodate the text.
data.short_description: The text below the streaming rp of a user has a lot of space below it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find someone with a streaming status. - Open their profile.
